content: Award The **Pingat Berkebolehan** (**Tentera**) (English: Efficiency Medal (Military)) is a [decoration](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) awarded to any member of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) who has clearly demonstrated exceptional efficiency, devotion to duty, or produced work of special significance. The candidate is also one who has shown initiative, thoroughness, and resourcefulness in their work. The [Pingat Berkebolehan](/wiki/Pingat_Berkebolehan) is the civil equivalent award. ## Description - The ribbon is purple with a white central stripe and white edges. - MINDEF Singapore Medals factsheet page - World Medals Pingat Berkebolehan (Tentera) page This Singapore-related article is a stub.
